_sText:
Hello everyone! This is my first map ever.

Features:
=========
- 38 players spawn
- complex lighting
- many games
- complex environment
- good graphics

Locations:
==================
- Armory with 12 CT spawns, FREEDAY button, motorboat, weapon dispencers
- Cells with many secrets (26 TT spawns)
- Medic
- Last Request room (places for knife fight, gun toss and shot4shot)
- Yard
- Magazine
- Kitchen
- Office
- Footbridges and gun turrets system

Games:
==================
- Talent (with glass cage, places for 3 jurors and explosive stage)
- Soccer (fully automated team system)
- Crazy car
- Simon says
- Course
- PVP
- Race
- Surf
- Sliderace
- Climb

The whole map has many unique elements, such as explosive security gates (CT pass only).

This is very early beta version and many things are about to be added/fixed.

Any ideas? Post them below.

Thanks for playing my map and have fun! :)
